title: Quick Tab Debug ID Feature Implementation
details:
## Quick Tab Debug UID Display Feature (v1.6.3.2)

### Implementation Summary
Added toggleable debug UID display to Quick Tab titlebars.

### Key Files Modified
1. `src/core/config.js` - Added `QUICK_TAB_SETTINGS_KEY` to CONSTANTS
2. `src/features/quick-tabs/handlers/CreateHandler.js` - Added `init()` method to load setting, added `showDebugId` to options
3. `src/features/quick-tabs/index.js` - Made initialization async to call `createHandler.init()`
4. `src/features/quick-tabs/coordinators/UICoordinator.js` - Updated to use shared CONSTANTS

### Architecture Pattern
Settings are loaded from `browser.storage.sync` under `quick_tab_settings` key during handler initialization, then cached and passed through the creation chain.

### Already Implemented Components (Pre-existing)
- options_page.html/js - UI toggle for `quickTabShowDebugId`
- window.js - Passes `showDebugId` to TitlebarBuilder
- TitlebarBuilder.js - `_createDebugIdElement()` method creates the display

### Complexity Reduction
Refactored `_buildTabOptions()` to stay under ESLint complexity limit by extracting:
- `_buildGeometryOptions()` - position/size options
- `_buildVisibilityOptions()` - minimized/solo/mute/debug options
- `_extractCallbacks()` - callback functions
